body: ### The Travis CI build is failing as of 639d9577 Thanks for your contribution! :tada: :raised_hands: Unfortunately, it looks like the Travis CI build for this Pull Request is currently failing. Here's the output log from our tests: ``` > ci-ally@1.0.0 test /home/travis/build/nickcannariato/ci-ally > jest && standard FAIL test/index.test.js â— My Probot app â€º creates a comment when an issue is opened This is a purposefully thrown error 35 | .reply(200) 36 | // Receive a webhook event > 37 | throw new Error('This is a purposefully thrown error') | ^ 38 | await probot.receive({ name: 'issues', payload }) 39 | }) 40 | }) at Object.test (test/index.test.js:37:11) PASS test/helpers/travis.test.js PASS test/helpers/actions.test.js PASS test/helpers/genCommentBody.test.js Test Suites: 1 failed, 3 passed, 4 total Tests: 1 failed, 4 passed, 5 total Snapshots: 0 total Time: 1.923s ``` Good luck! If you feel like you're stuck but want to keep working on this, _please_ don't hesitate to ping one of the maintainers and they'll get back to you shortly
